energy.usef.core.service.business

Class IncomingMessageVerificationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.core.service.business.IncomingMessageVerificationService

  • public class IncomingMessageVerificationService
extends Object
    Service class in charge of business validations on incoming messages (before they are sent to the incoming queue).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IncomingMessageVerificationService()

    • Method Detail

      • validateSender

        public void validateSender(SignedMessage signedMessage,
                           Message incomingMessage)
                    throws BusinessException
        Perform the validations concerning the sender of the incoming message.
        Parameters:
        signedMessage - - SignedMessage
        incomingMessage - - Message
        Throws:
        BusinessException - if an business error is encountered

      • validateMessageId

        public void validateMessageId(String messageId)
                       throws BusinessException
        Checks whether the message is using an already existing messageId.
        Parameters:
        messageId - - String UUID of the incoming message
        Throws:
        BusinessException - if the MessageMetadata.getMessageID() of the message is already present in the database.

      • validateMessageValidUntil

        public void validateMessageValidUntil(org.joda.time.LocalDateTime validUntil)
                               throws BusinessException
        Checks whether the message is received.
        Parameters:
        validUntil - - LocalDateTime when the validity of this message ends.
        Throws:
        BusinessException - if the MessageMetadata.getMessageID() of the message is already present in the database.

      • checkSignedMessageHash

        public void checkSignedMessageHash(byte[] hashedContent)
                            throws BusinessException
        Checks whether the Sha256 hash of an incoming signed message is not present already. If already present, a BusinessException with IncomingMessageError.ALREADY_RECEIVED_AND_SUCCESSFULLY_PROCESSED is thrown. Otherwise, create a new entry in the database and exits the method.
        Parameters:
        hashedContent - - Byte array with the Sha256 of the incoming signed message.
        Throws:
        BusinessException
